author: Yves Pelletier
comment: Nice little app, but please make it fit on a moto 360 (bottom row is not complete due to the black row on moto 360)
title: Moto 360

author: Rob Barker
comment: Great concept, and nice graphics. Your launcher icon needs a transparent background, and your Nice Job text doesn't fit on the LG G Watch.  As a new mode for younger babies, you could show a single balloon up in a random place, and the kid has to simply pop it.  Good luck!
title: Good start

author: Carolyn Modrell
comment: Hey guys like it was great
title: Blone p
